• Pass through all Units. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Can be retriggered within 3s of casting at no cost.
abilities.menu_description: Dash forward a fixed distance dealing 60/80/100/120/140 (+50%) magical damage to all enemies Shinbi passes through. Rushing Beat can be retriggered within 3s of casting to dash a second time at no cost.

abilities.game_description:
Summon a Spirit Wolf that runs in a straight line.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Passes through all Units.
abilities.menu_description: Summon a Spirit Wolf that runs in a straight line and passes through all Enemy Targets dealing 85/110/135/160/185 (+45%) magical damage.

abilities.game_description:
Summon 4 Spirit Wolves that circle you.
• Grants a {Shield}()Shield. • Lasts {Duration}s. • Deals {Damage}()Damage over {Duration}s. • Grants another {Shield}()Shield.
abilities.menu_description: Summon 4 Spirit Wolves that circle Shinbi for 3s, granting a 50/80/110/140/170 (+55%) shield for the same duration and after the wolves expire. The wolves deal 20/31/42/53/64 (+28%) magical damage over the duration to nearby enemies.

abilities.game_description:
Summon a pack of Spirit Wolves above the Target.
• Targets the Hero with the most Track Stacks. • Deals {Damage}()Damage per Spirit Wolf. Passive: Ability hits on Heroes applies Track for {StackDuration}s. • Stacks up to {MaxStacks} times.
abilities.menu_description: Passive: Dealing damage to Enemy Heroes with Abilities applies Track for 8s, stacking up to 8 times. Active: Summon a pack of Spirit Wolves to attack the Target with the most Track Stacks, dealing 55/90/125 (+18%) magical damage per Spirit Wolf.

abilities.game_description:
• Deal an additional {Damage}()Damage On-Hit.
On dealing damage with a Basic Attack:
• Deals {Multiplier}x Damage and applies Track. • Ability hits on Heroes reduces the Cooldown by {CDReduction}s.
abilities.menu_description: Basic attacks deal an additional 12 (+15%) magical damage on-hit. Periodically Biting Melody deals 3x damage. Damaging an Enemy Hero with an ability decreases the cooldown by 1s.

abilities.game_description:
Ranged Basic Attack.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.menu_description: Ranged basic attack dealing 57 (+75%) physical damage.

abilities.game_description:
Hypercharge Starfire.
• Lasts {Duration}s and Refreshes on Takedown. • Deals {Damage}()Damage per hit. • Applies On-Hit Effects at {OnHitModifier}% effectiveness. • Heroes take {DamageRamp}% more Damage per hit. Max: 25%. • Deal Damage equal to {Pen}% of Enemy Physical Armor at Max Stacks. Passive: Basic Attacks deal {PassiveDamage}()Damage on-hit.
abilities.menu_description: Skylar hypercharges Starfire for 5s (refreshes on hero takedown): Convert bonus attack speed into on-hit physical damage and attack at a fixed rate of 10 attacks per second. Damage is modified to 1/3/5/7/9 (+11%)(+6%)(+15%) per instance and applies on-hit effects at 11% effectiveness. Dealing Damage to the same target within 1s increases the damage by 1.25%, stacking up to 25 times. At maximum stacks, deal damage equal to 6/9/12/15/18% of the targets Bonus Physical Armor. Passive: Basic Attacks deal 4/8/12/16/20 (+10% ) bonus physical damage on-hit.

abilities.game_description:
Launch a bouncing nano bubble:
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attaches to the first Target hit for {Delay}s. After the duration: • Deals {ExplosionDamage}()Damage to nearby Enemies. • Slows them by {Slow}% for {SlowDuration}s.
abilities.menu_description: Launch a bouncing nano bubble that attaches to the first target hit for 0.75s and deals 25/40/55/70/85 (+20% ) physical damage. After the duration, the target and nearby enemies take 70/100/130/160/190 (+90%)(+50%) physical damage and are Slowed by 40/45/50/55/60% for 1s.

abilities.game_description:
Thrust upwards after a short delay.
• Hover for {HoverDuration}s. Whilst Hovering, dealing damage will fire a missile: • Deals {Damage}()Damage to the same Target. • Can only occur intermittently with Hypercharge.
abilities.menu_description: After a short delay, thrust upwards in your current movement direction and hover for 3.25s. During this time, dealing damage will fire a missile that deals 25/35/45/55/65 (+15%)(+10%) physical damage to the same target. This can only occur intermittently with Hypercharge but the time decreases with bonus attack speed.

abilities.game_description:
Unleash the Atomiser.
• Travels until colliding with Terrain or an Enemy Hero. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Deals an extra {MissingHealthDamage}% Missing Health Damage.
abilities.menu_description: Channel for a short period of time before firing a large orb of unstable energy. The orb stops on the first hero hit, exploding, dealing 200/330/460 (+135%)(+100%)(+15/20/25% of target’s missing health) physical damage.

abilities.game_description:
Upon killing an Enemy Unit:
• Form an orb that explodes after 0.75s. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Orbs from Heroes have triple Damage and Radius. • Gain additional Jump Height.
abilities.menu_description:
Skylar gains additional Jump Height.

Killing an Enemy Unit makes it explode after 0.75s, dealing 30 (+5 per level) physical damage to nearby targets.

Explosions from Enemy Heroes are 3x larger and deal 3x more damage.

abilities.game_description:
Ranged Basic Attack.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}. On hitting Targets affected by Relentless: • Deal an extra {HealthPercent}% Maximum Health Damage On-Hit. • The Damage is multiplied by Relentless stack count.
abilities.menu_description: Ranged basic attack dealing 60 (+85%) physical damage.

abilities.game_description:
Charge a powerful piercing arrow.
• Reaches maximum power after {MaxChargeTime}s. • Deals up to {Damage}()Damage. • Relentless increases Damage by {IncreasedPercent}% per stack. • Pierces through all Units and Terrain.
abilities.menu_description: Charge a Terrain piercing arrow, reaching 50-100% maximum power after 1s and dealing up to 90/135/180/225/270 (+160%) physical damage to all Enemies in its path. Targets afflicted by Relentless receive 7% additional damage per stack.

abilities.game_description:
Release a volley of arrows raining down over 2.5s.
• Deal {Damage}()Damage over 5 hits. • Slows by {SlowPercent}% for 0.8s.
abilities.menu_description: Release a volley of arrows that rain down over 2.5s, dealing 120/170/220/270/320 (+150%) physical damage to all Enemies in the area over 5 hits. Enemies struck by Hail Of Arrows are Slowed by 28/31/34/37/40% for 0.8s.

abilities.game_description:
<Header>Focus your mind, becoming empowered.</Header>
• Gain <EffectText>{Percent}% Attack Speed</EffectText> for <EffectText>{Duration}s</EffectText>.
• Landing Basic Attacks extends its duration by <EffectText>{IncreasedDuration}s</EffectText>.
• Lasts a maximum of <EffectText>{MaxDuration}s</EffectText>.
abilities.menu_description:
Sparrow focuses her mind, gaining 35/<wbr>40/<wbr>45/<wbr>50/<wbr>55% attack speed for 3s.

Landing basics attacks while Heightened Senses is active extends its duration by 0.5s, up to a maximum of 6s.

abilities.game_description:
<Header>Augment your Bow Shot to fire 3 arrows for {Duration}s.</Header>
• Gain <EffectText>200 Attack Range</EffectText>.
• Gain <AttackDamageText>{BonusAD} Physical Power</AttackDamageText>.
• Gain <EffectText>{Percent}% Movement Speed</EffectText>.
• Arrows pierce through Units.
• Side arrows deal <AttackDamageText>{PercentDamage}%</AttackDamageText> of <AbilityName>Bow Shot</AbilityName> <AttackDamageText>Damage</AttackDamageText>.
abilities.menu_description:
Invoke Sparrow's blazing spirit, augmenting her Bow Shot to release a fan of 3 piercing arrows for 6s. During this time, Sparrow gains 200 attack range, 15/<wbr>20/<wbr>25 physical power and 8% movement speed.

Side arrows deal 50/<wbr>60/<wbr>70% of Bow Shot's damage.

abilities.game_description:
<Header>On successful Ability hits and Basic Attacks:</Header>
• Apply a stack of <EffectText>Relentless</EffectText> to Heroes.
• Stacks last for <EffectText>{Duration}s</EffectText> (Max <EffectText>{NumStacks}</EffectText> stacks).
abilities.menu_description:
Sparrow's basic attacks and abilities apply stacks of Relentless to Enemy Heroes. Her basic attacks against Targets afflicted by Relentless deal an additional 0.4% of their maximum health as bonus physical damage on-hit, per stack.

Relentless stacks last for 3s, stacking up to 6 times.

abilities.game_description:
Melee Basic Attack.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.menu_description: Melee basic attack dealing 63 (+90%) physical damage.

abilities.game_description:
Bash forward with your shield.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Deals an extra {HealthPercent}% Maximum Health Damage. • Stuns for {StunDuration}s.
abilities.menu_description: Swipe forward with Steel's shield, dealing 50/65/80/95/110 (+50%) (+5.5% of the Target's maximum health) magical damage to all Enemies in front of him and Stunning them for 0.5s.

abilities.game_description:
Charge forward in a line.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Stuns for 2s and Knocks Back Heroes.
abilities.menu_description: Charge forward, dealing 115/160/205/250/295 (+70%) magical damage to all Enemies in Steel's path. Enemy Heroes struck by Bull Rush are Knocked Back. Monsters and Minions are Stunned for 2s.

abilities.game_description:
Deploy a disruptive wall of energy.
• Destroys Enemy projectiles for {Duration}s. • Deals {Damage}()Damage to Heroes. • Slows by {SlowPercent}% for {SlowDuration}s.
abilities.menu_description: Deploy a disruptive wall of energy, blocking all incoming Enemy Projectiles for 5s. When an Enemy Hero first passes through the wall, they take 70/90/110/130/150 (+50%) magical damage and are Slowed by 10/15/20/25/30% for 0.75s.

abilities.game_description:
Leap into a powerful impact.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Knocks Up and Stuns for {StunDuration}s.
abilities.menu_description: Leap into the sky, crashing down at the target location to deal 220/330/440 (+80%) magical damage to all Enemies in the area, Knocking them Up and Stunning them for 1.25s.

abilities.game_description:
On Immobilizing a Hero with an Ability:
• Gain a {Shield}()Shield for {Duration}s.
abilities.menu_description: Each time Steel Immobilizes an Enemy Hero with an ability, he gains a 15/30/45 (+1.6/3.2/4.8% ) shield for 3.5s.

abilities.game_description:
Melee Basic Attack.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.menu_description: Melee basic attack dealing 61 (+80%) physical damage.

abilities.game_description:
Charge up and Dash forward:
• Channel to increase Range and Damage over {MaxCharge}s. • Deals {Damage}-{MaxDamage}()Damage based on charge time. • Knocks Back and Stuns for {Stun}s on impact. • Colliding with a Hero stops the Dash. • Times out and refunds {CooldownRefund}% Cooldown after {MaxDuration}s. Empowered: Shields for {Shield}() for {ShieldDuration}s on Enemy Hit.
abilities.menu_description: Terra Channels for up to 4s before dashing. She deals 40/60/80/100/120 (+80%) physical damage to all Enemies in her path, stopping if she collides with a Hero. Enemies hit are Knocked Back for 0.25s. For the first 1.25s, dash range and damage increases, dealing up to 100/150/200/250/300 (+200%). Empowered: On Enemy hit, gain a 10/65/120/175/230 (+12% ) shield for 3.5s.

abilities.game_description:
Spin your axe around you, striking twice
: • Deals {Damage}()Damage each strike. • Hitting Heroes refunds {CooldownRefund}% Cooldown per strike. Empowered: Strike three times: • The third strike deals {TrueDamage}()Damage.
abilities.menu_description: Terra spins her axe, striking all Enemies around her before slashing forward a second time. Each strike deals 40/60/80/100/120 (+80%) physical damage. Enemy Hero hits refund 10% of the cooldown per strike. Empowered: Terra strikes three times, with the third strike dealing 50/75/100/125/150 (+125%) true damage to all Enemies in front of her.

abilities.game_description:
Throw a spectral axe:
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Slows Enemies by {Slow}% for {SlowDuration}s • Pierces Minions and Monsters. Empowered: Roots Enemies instead for {RootDuration}s.
abilities.menu_description: Throw a spectral axe, dealing 100/135/170/205/240 (+90%) magical damage and Slowing by 20/28/36/44/52% for 1.25s. Pierces Minions and Monsters. Empowered: Roots Enemies instead for 1.25s.

abilities.game_description:
<Header>Slam down your helmet</Header>:
• <EffectText>Cleanse</EffectText> any <CC_Text>Debuffs</CC_Text> and gain Max <EffectText>Hersir</EffectText> stacks.

Buff yourself for the next <EffectText>{Duration}s</EffectText>:
• Become <CC_Text>Unstoppable</CC_Text>.
• Double the Bonus Armors granted by this Ability.

<EffectText>Passive:</EffectText> Gain <AttackDamageText>{PhysicalArmor} Physical Armor</AttackDamageText> and <AbilityPowerText>{MagicalArmor} Magical Armor</AbilityPowerText>.
abilities.menu_description:
Terra’s helmet slams down, Cleansing all Debuffs and granting her maximum Hersir stacks instantly. 

For the next 5/<wbr>6/<wbr>7s, Terra becomes Unstoppable (Immune to Crowd Control) and doubles the Bonus Armors granted by this Ability.

Passive: Gain 8/<wbr>16/<wbr>24 Physical Armor and 8/<wbr>16/<wbr>24 Magical Armor.

abilities.game_description:
<Header>Damage Enemies to gain Stacks of Hersir</Header>:
• <EffectText>Carve</EffectText> grants 1 stack on-hit.
• <EffectText>Ruthless Assault</EffectText> can grant 1 stack per strike.
• <EffectText>Highland Hurl</EffectText> & <EffectText>Wild Rush</EffectText> can grant 1 stack per cast.
• Enter the <EffectText>Base</EffectText> to gain 5 stacks.

Upon reaching 5 Stacks:
• Your next <EffectText>Basic Ability</EffectText> becomes <AbilityName>Empowered</AbilityName>.
abilities.menu_description:
Terra gains stacks of Hersir when damaging Enemies with her Basic Attacks and Abilities, up to a maximum of 5.

At maximum stacks, Terra's next Basic Ability is Empowered with additional effects.

Entering the Base grants Terra maximum Hersir stacks instantly.

abilities.game_description:
Ranged Basic Attack.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.menu_description: Ranged basic attack dealing 60 (+60%) physical damage.

abilities.game_description:
Create a patch of toxic spores.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage over 2.5s. • Then, explodes dealing {Damage}()Damage.
abilities.menu_description: Hurl a small plant that deals 140/195/250/305/360 (+100%) magical damage over time to all Enemies in the area, exploding after 2.5s. Untamed Growth deals 50% of its damage over its lifetime, and 50% upon exploding.

abilities.game_description:
Summon a patch of thorny brambles.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Enemies touched are Slowed by {Slow}% for {SlowDuration}s. • Persists for {Duration}s before wilting.
abilities.menu_description: Summon a patch of thorny brambles, dealing 120/160/200/240/280 (+50%) magical damage to all Enemies that touch them and Slowing them by 34/38/42/46/50% for 0.5s. Bramble Patch persists for 5s before wilting.

abilities.game_description:
Throw an orb of energy.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Hit the same Target within {StackDuration}s for a bonus. • Deals {StackDamageIncrease}% more Damage. (Stacks up to 4 times.) • Refunds 75% Mana on hitting a Hero or Killing a Unit.
abilities.menu_description: Throw an orb of energy, dealing 85/120/155/190/225 (+45%) magical damage. Hitting the same Target within 8s deals 20% increased damage, stacking up to 4 times. Harvest Nettles refunds 75% of its mana cost upon hitting an Enemy Hero or Killing a Unit.

abilities.game_description:
Awaken a giant fly trap.
• Attaches itself to nearby Heroes. • After a delay it Pulls attached Heroes inward. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Stuns for {StunDuration}s.
abilities.menu_description: Plant a magical seedling, awakening a giant fly trap that attaches itself to all nearby Enemy Heroes. After a brief delay, it Pulls its victims inward, dealing 250/375/500 (+65%) magical damage and Stunning them for 1s.

abilities.game_description:
<Header>On Takedown:</Header>
• Spawn an <AbilityName>Untamed Growth</AbilityName> from the Hero's corpse.
• Gain <EffectText>{SpeedPercent}% Movement Speed</EffectText> for <EffectText>{RegenerateDuration}s</EffectText>.
abilities.menu_description: Each time The Fey achieves a Takedown she spawns an Untamed Growth from the Enemy Hero's corpse and gains 30% movement speed for 3s.

abilities.game_description:
Ranged Basic Attack.
• Fires twice. • Each deals {Damage}()Damage. • Applies On-Hit Effects at {OnHitModifier}% effectiveness. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.menu_description: Ranged basic attack that fires two projectiles, each dealing 31 (+45%) physical damage and applying on-hit effects at 50% effectiveness.

abilities.game_description:
Launch a bouncing grenade.
• Explodes on contact with an Enemy. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Slows by {Slow}% for {SlowDuration}s. • Holds up to 2 grenades.
abilities.menu_description: Launch a grenade in target direction that explodes upon contact with an Enemy Target, dealing 45/65/85/105/125 (+65%) magical damage in a small area and Slowing by 15% for 0.75s. Max Charges: 2.

abilities.game_description:
Fire two piercing projectiles.
• Each deals {Damage}()Damage. • Applies On-Hit Effects at {OnHitModifier}% effectiveness.
abilities.menu_description: TwinBlast charges and fires two superheated piercing projectiles in the target direction, each dealing 60/80/100/120/140 (+40%)(+55%) physical damage and applying on-hit effects to all Enemy Units hit at 60% effectiveness.

abilities.game_description:
<Header>Use your thrusters to boost in a direction.</Header>
• Damaging a Hero reduces the <EffectText>Cooldown</EffectText> by <EffectText>{CooldownReduction}s</EffectText>.
abilities.menu_description:
Passive: When TwinBlast deals damage to an Enemy Hero with a Basic Attack or Ability, Rocket Dash's cooldown is decreased by 0.5s.

Active: TwinBlast dashes.

abilities.game_description:
Transform your pistols into machine guns.
• Unleashes a barrage of {NumBullets}()bullets over 3s. • Deals a total of {Damage}()Damage.
abilities.menu_description: Transform your guns into fully automatic machine guns, unleashing a barrage of 22 (+4% Total Attack Speed) bullets over 3s dealing 16/23/30 (+10%)(+7%) physical damage per bullet.

abilities.game_description:
<Header> On casting an Ability:</Header>
• Increases <EffectText>Attack Speed</EffectText> by <EffectText>{AttackSpeed}%</EffectText>.
• Lasts for <EffectText>{Attacks}</EffectText> Basic Attacks or <EffectText>{Duration}s</EffectText>
abilities.menu_description: Casting an ability will cause TwinBlast's next 2 basic attacks within 4s to benefit from 40% increased Total Attack Speed.

abilities.game_description:
Ranged Basic Attack.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.menu_description: Ranged basic attack dealing 62 (+85%) physical damage.

abilities.game_description:
Fire a long-range sniper shot:
• Deals {Damage}() Damage. • Deals {BonusDamage}% more damage to Minions. • Pierces through Terrain. If this Kills, or Damages a Marked Unit: • Refund {ManaRefund}% Mana Cost and set the Cooldown to {CDROnKill}s.
abilities.menu_description: Fire a long-range sniper shot that pierces Terrain and deals 100/125/150/175/200 (+120%)(+85%) physical damage to the first Enemy Unit hit. Damage is increased by 50% against Enemy Minions. If Knock, Knock! Kills, or Damages a Marked Unit, 60% of the Mana Cost is refunded and its Cooldown is decreased to 1s.

abilities.game_description:
Launch a piercing Nanite Grenade.
• Deals {Damage}() Damage. • Slows by {Slow}% for {SlowDuration}s. • Units hit are Marked for {MarkDuration}s, Revealing them. • Explodes upon hitting Terrain. Knock, Knock! is enhanced against Marked Units: • Deals an extra {BonusDamage}()% Maximum Health Damage.
abilities.menu_description: Launch a piercing Nanite Grenade that deals 50/65/80/95/110 (+40%)(+45%) physical damage to all Units hit, Slowing them by 28/31/34/37/40% for 1s. Units hit are also Marked for 4s, Revealing them. Knock, Knock! is enhanced against Marked Units, dealing an extra 6/6.5/7/7.5/8% (+2% per 100 Magical Power) of their maximum health as bonus magical damage.

abilities.game_description:
<Header>After a short delay:</Header>
• Enter <EffectText>Camouflage</EffectText>.
• Gain <EffectText>{MoveSpeed}% movement speed</EffectText> for <EffectText>{Duration}s</EffectText>. 
• Attacking ends the effect.
• Cooldown resets on Takedown.

<EffectText>Passive: </EffectText>Gain <PenDamageText>{PhysicalPenetrationPercent}% Physical Penetration</PenDamageText>.
abilities.menu_description:
After a short delay, enter Camouflage and gain 25% movement speed for 3.5s.

Takedowns will reset the cooldown of Surprise, Surprise!

Passive: Gain 10/<wbr>12.5/<wbr>15/<wbr>17.5/<wbr>20% Physical Penetration

abilities.game_description:
<Header>Teleport a Hero to a previous location:</Header> 
• Heroes can be selected up to <EffectText>{Range}</EffectText> units away.
• Marks their location from <EffectText>2s</EffectText> prior. 
• After <EffectText>2.5s</EffectText> they enter <EffectText>Limbo</EffectText> and <EffectText>Teleport</EffectText> back.
abilities.menu_description: Wraith can choose an Enemy Hero he can see up to 1350/<wbr>1450/<wbr>1550 units, marking their location from 2s prior. After a 2.5s delay they will enter Limbo and Teleport back to this location.

abilities.game_description:
<Header> Wraith is granted a Sonar Drone that:</Header>
• Replaces your <EffectText>Vision Item</EffectText>.
• Cannot be swapped.

When Sonar Drone is deployed it:
• Becomes <EffectText>Camouflaged</EffectText>.
• Pulses every <EffectText>{PingInterval}s</EffectText>, <EffectText>Revealing</EffectText> nearby Heroes for <EffectText>3s</EffectText>.
• At <AbilityName>Level 6</AbilityName>, <EffectText>Reveals</EffectText> Invisible Units for <EffectText>{StealthDetectionAmount}</EffectText> pulses.
abilities.menu_description:
Wraith's Vision Item becomes a Sonar Drone that will become Camouflaged upon deployment and will scan the surrounding area every 3s, revealing Enemy Heroes within 1000 units for 3s. 

Sonar Drone can detect Enemy Heroes through walls. 

Upon reaching Level 6, Sonar Drone also reveals invisible Units for the first 2 pulses.

abilities.game_description:
Melee Basic Attack.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.menu_description: Melee basic attack dealing 61 (+80%) physical damage.

abilities.game_description:
Hurl your spear forward.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Increased by {BonusDamage}% against Targets below 20% Health. • Deals {MinionDamage}% damage to Minions. • Releasing within 0.3s will Thrust the spear forward. • Thrusts refund 50% of the Cooldown.
abilities.menu_description: Channel to throw a spear, dealing 75/105/135/165/195 (+110%) physical damage to Enemies hit, increased by 100% against targets below 20% maximum health. Deals 75% damage to Minions. Releasing within 0.3s will thrust the spear forward, dealing the same damage and refunding half the cooldown.

abilities.game_description:
Unfold a shield for {Duration}s
. • Gain {DamageReduction}% forward facing Damage Reduction. • On recast or after the duration, swing the shield. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Increased up to {IncreasedDamage}()Damage based on duration. • Stuns for {Stun}s.
abilities.menu_description: Unfold a shield for 1.75s, reducing incoming damage by 50/55/60/65/70%. Upon recasting or after the duration, swing the shield dealing 52/68/84/100/116 (+80%) physical damage increased up to 130/170/210/250/290 (+200%) and stunning targets hit for 0.5s.

abilities.game_description:
<Header>Dash in your current movement direction.</Header>
• Gain <EffectText>{MovementSpeedMagnitude}% Movement Speed</EffectText> for <EffectText>{MovementSpeedDuration}s</EffectText>.
• Gain <EffectText>{AttackSpeed}% Attack Speed</EffectText> for <EffectText>{AttackSpeedDuration}s</EffectText>.
abilities.menu_description: Dash in your current movement direction, gaining 15% movement speed for 1.5s and 15/<wbr>20/<wbr>25/<wbr>30/<wbr>35% Attack Speed for 4s.

abilities.game_description:
Leap at a Hero creating a coliseum.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage to the Target Hero. • The Coliseum lasts for {Duration}s. • The bonus from Gladiator is doubled. • If the Target is killed, gain {OnKillPowerGain} Physical Power. • Recasting this ability will end it early.
abilities.menu_description: Leap at an Enemy Hero, dealing 200/300/400 (+75%) physical damage. A Coliseum is then summoned for 5.5s and the bonus from Gladiator is doubled. If the target is killed within the duration, you will permanently gain 5/8/11 Physical Power. You may recast this ability to end it early.

abilities.game_description:
On dealing damage to non-Minions:
• Gain a stack of Gladiator. • Stacks up to 8 times. • Each stack grants {PhysicalPower}()Physical Power. • Stacks will fall off after 5s without combat. • Restore {MaxHealthHealing}()Health per stack consumed.
abilities.menu_description:
Gain a stack of Gladiator when dealing damage with Basic Attacks or Abilities to non-minions, stacking up to 8 times. Each stack grants 1% increased Physical Power. 

After exiting combat, stacks will fall off once per second, restoring 0.4/<wbr>0.4/<wbr>0.4/<wbr>0.4/<wbr>0.4/<wbr>0.8/<wbr>0.8/<wbr>0.8/<wbr>0.8/<wbr>0.8/<wbr>1.6/<wbr>1.6/<wbr>1.6/<wbr>1.6/<wbr>1.6/<wbr>3.2/<wbr>3.2/<wbr>3.2% of his maximum health per stack consumed.

abilities.game_description:
Ranged Basic Attack.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.menu_description: Ranged basic attack dealing 50 (+60%) physical damage.

abilities.game_description:
Fire a healing bolt at an Ally:
• Restores {Healing}()Health. • Increases by up to {HealingBonus}% based on Missing Health. Passive: Basic Attacks deal {Damage}()Damage On-Hit over 3s.
abilities.menu_description: Fire a healing bolt at an Ally that restores 50/70/90/110/130 (+35%) health, increasing by up to 50% based on their missing health. Passive: Zinx's Basic Attacks become empowered, dealing 12/18/24/30/36 (+15%) magical damage on-hit over 3s.

abilities.game_description:
Launch an electromagnetic disk:
• Stops on the first Enemy hit. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Stuns for {StunDuration}s. The disk ricochets {Ricochet} times, dealing the same effects: • Stun duration decreased by {AdditionalStunDuration}%. • Will not ricochet to previously hit Targets.
abilities.menu_description: Throw an electromagnetic disk dealing 80/110/140/170/200 (+40%) magical damage and Stunning for 1.1/1.15/1.2/1.25/1.3s. The disk can ricochet up to 5 times, dealing its damage again and Stunning each Target for 50% of the original duration. Will not ricochet to previously hit Targets.

abilities.game_description:
Discharge a pool of unstable radiation:
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Slows by {SlowPercent}% for {SlowDuration}s. After 0.75s, the pool erupts: • Deals {EruptDamage}()Damage. • Slows by {EruptSlow}% for {EruptSlowDuration}s.
abilities.menu_description: Shoot the ground to form a pool of radiation that deals 35/50/65/80/95 (+25%) magical damage and Slows by 30% for 0.75s. After 0.75s, the radiation erupts dealing 50/80/110/140/170 (+40%) magical damage and Slowing Enemies hit by 50% for 0.75s.

abilities.game_description:
<Header>Apply cellular restructuring to Yourself or an Ally:</Header> 
• Grants <EffectText>40%</EffectText> decaying <EffectText>Movement Speed</EffectText> for <EffectText>{Duration}s</EffectText>.
• Grants <EffectText>Revival</EffectText> for <EffectText>{Duration}s</EffectText>.

If the Target takes lethal damage within this time:
• After <EffectText>2.5s</EffectText>, they <EffectText>Resurrect</EffectText> with <EffectText>{HealthManaPercent}%</EffectText> <HealthText>Health</HealthText> and <ManaText>Mana</ManaText>.
abilities.menu_description:
Apply cellular restructuring to Yourself or an Ally Hero, granting 40% decaying movement speed and Revival for 4s.

If the Target takes lethal damage within this time, they Resurrect with 35/<wbr>45/<wbr>55% health and mana after 2.5s.

abilities.game_description:
<Header>Gain stacks upon damaging Enemy Heroes:</Header>
• Stacks last for <EffectText>{Duration}s</EffectText>.
• <AbilityName>Triage Protocol</AbilityName> activates at <EffectText>5</EffectText> stacks.

Upon activation, become Empowered for the next <EffectText>{Duration}s</EffectText>:
• Gain <EffectText>40%</EffectText> decaying <EffectText>Movement Speed</EffectText>.
• <AbilityName>Infuse</AbilityName> restores <HealthText>{Multiplier}%</HealthText> more <HealthText>Health</HealthText>.
abilities.menu_description:
Zinx gains a stack for 5s when damaging Enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks or Abilities, up to a maximum of 5.

At maximum stacks, Triage Protocol activates granting Zinx 40% decaying movement speed and  40% increased Infuse Healing for 5s. 

Stacks cannot be gained while Triage Protocol is on cooldown.
